testcase.name: [C457292] Try to add a kid with duplicate name.

Add another kid with name "Kid B".

Now add Kid A with name 'Kid B'.
step.expectedresults: 1.Duplicate name message should appear.

testcase.name: [C457356] Add a kid with duplicate name and press back.

step.actions: Steps - 1. Tap on My Settings>My Family> Add Family Member, on Add Family Member page 2. try to add a member with duplicate name, you will get msg saying "You already have an asset...." tap ok here 3. again try to add same member with duplicate name and while request is getting processed click back button. 4. waiting on this page,and check the result.
step.expectedresults: You should not get message "Uncaught Exception" and kid should not get added.
